name: sg
description: This is a rhythm game created as part of the Serious Games course at Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt.

scripts.postinstall: cd app && npm i && cd .. && cd backend && npm i && cd .. && npm i -g generate-react-cli
scripts.start: cd docker &&  docker-compose up -d --build --force-recreate -V && node start-keycloak-dev.mjs && cd .. && concurrently -n frontend,backend,db-viewer,api-doc-viewer "cd app && npm start" "cd backend && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm start" "mongoku start" "npm run api-doc-viewer"
scripts.build: node scripts/generate-credits.mjs && cd app && npm run build
scripts.deploy: ssh finsternis "cd beatfork && git pull && npm i && npm run build && rsync -r --del app/build/ /var/www/html && npm run docker-prod && npm run backend-prod"
scripts.docker-prod: cd docker && docker-compose -f production.yml up -d --remove-orphans && cd ..
scripts.backend-prod: pm2 stop beatfork ; pm2 delete beatfork ; cd backend ; NODE_ENV=production pm2 start app.mjs --name beatfork
